column5: Our group is thinking of changing to a spring trip in 2012. If given the choice between the 1st week in June and the 2nd week which would you choose if you where fishing out of EaR Falls.

Our group has always fished out of Goose Bay Camp, near Ear Falls. That being said I suggest you start contacting the camps in that area, those weeks will fill up fast! Evergreen has always recieved good recommendations, our group has been at GBC for over ten years, but Andrea will fill up fast for those weeks. Good luck!
